#summary How to use Ant on Android

This is how to use Ant on Android (needs JavaIDEdroid PRO):
  # Get JavaIDEdroid v2.5.0 or later from Google Play
  # Get ant_1-9-1_openjdk6-javac.jar.dex.zip from the external Download area and copy it to the storage card of your Android device
